assessment_item.subject: Accountancy Volume 2
assessment_item.title: AJRAEI Q12.An expenditure is in capital nature when
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

An expenditure is in capital nature when

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

The receiver of the amount is going to use it for the purchase of fixed assets

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1475"},{"text":"

It increases the quantity of fixed assets

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1476"},{"text":"

It is paid as interest on loans for business

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1486"},{"text":"

It maintains a fixed asset

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1491"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"AJRAEI Q12.An expenditure is in capital nature when","title":"AJRAEI Q12.An expenditure is in capital nature when","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"English","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Accountancy Volume 2","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
